## Crack Nucleation and Growth Subjected to Dynamic Loads

- Ph.D. project at Dolbow Lab, Duke University
- Developed with [RACCOON](https://hugary1995.github.io/raccoon/), an open-source finite-element code tailored for phase-field fracture modeling, built on the [MOOSE](https://mooseframework.inl.gov/) framework.
